1.text: I've been comparing REST and GraphQL for our new API. Both seem to have their merits but I'm having trouble deciding. Anyone have experience with both?
1.author: techlearner

2.text: GraphQL all the way! We switched from REST and it's been amazing. No more over-fetching, perfect for our frontend teams.
2.author: graphqlfan

3.text: Strongly disagree. REST with proper caching is still superior for most apps. GraphQL adds unnecessary complexity unless you have very specific needs.
3.author: apiarchitect

4.text: Ugh, spent 2 hours debugging this React error: 'Cannot read property 'map' of undefined'. Why does this keep happening? 😫
4.author: reactdev
